item.description:
The Early Ford V8 Club guys we do the Wings and Wheels show with are holding their 41st annual car show at the airport on April 17th.

Like previous years, they have offered to give us space for free to setup a table with our literature and park an airplane or two to show. It is a little less than two months before the June YE event and we usually get a lot of people pick up YE forms. Last year I brought my airplane out for people to see.

 

 

The car guys bring in thousands of people and it is a good opportunity to talk to the public and show them that airports, pilots, and airplanes are not their enemies.

It would be great if I could get 4 or 5 people to hang around the table and help answer questions with me. I am also looking for a 1 or 2 airplanes.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Airport Car Show
